thread.title: Nucor to Build New Florida Steel Mill as Domestic Producers Study Tariff Impact

author: Cara Lombardo
title: Nucor to Build New Florida Steel Mill as Domestic Producers Study Tariff Impact

organizations.name: build new florida steel mill as domestic producers study tariff impact nucor corp.

text:
Nucor Corp. said Monday it will build a $240 million steel mill, the latest investment from the company in a bid to capitalize on a rising market for the metal.
Chief Executive John Ferriola said the plant would produce reinforcing steel bars used in construction, and will give the company an advantage over competitors who ship rebar from long distances.
